text: Keyvan Vahdani ( 1 April 1991 – 20 March 2019) was an Iranian footballer. He played for Paykan, Nassaji and Pars Jonoubi. He died in a landslide in Mazandaran Province, Iran, on 20 March 2019 at the age of 27.Iranian footballer dies in landslide ==References== Category:1991 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Iranian footballers Category:Paykan F.C. players Category:Nassaji Mazandaran players Category:Saba players Category:Aluminium Arak players Category:Deaths in landslides Category:Association football forwards
title: Keyvan Vahdani
